item.title: Learning R
item.description: Day 2 (R plot and ggplot2): Data Source https://bolin.su.se/data/stockholm/files/stockholm-historical-weather-observations-2017/temperature/daily/raw/stockholm_daily_temp_obs_2013_2017_t1t2t3txtntm.txt textFile <- 'https://bolin.su.se/data/stockholm/files/stockholm-historical-weather-observations-2017/temperature/daily/raw/stockholm_daily_temp_obs_2013_2017_t1t2t3txtntm.txt' temp_Data <- basename(textFile) if (!file.exists(temp_Data)) { download.file(textFile, temp_Data) } temp_Data = read.table(temp_Data, header=FALSE) names(temp_Data) = c('year', 'month', 'day', 'morn', 'noon', 'eve','tmax', 'tmin', 'tmean') head(temp_Data) ## year month day morn noon eve tmax tmin tmean ## 1 2013 1 1 5.1 4.1 2.9 5.4 2.9 4.1 ## 2 2013 1 2 2.5 2.
